group_1.textCenter: This paper has Aimi’s handwriting on it...

group_1.textLeft: The edges are torn...@She must have torn it off in a hurry...?

group_1.textRight: You said it wasn't Aimi that I met, right?

group_1.textLeft: I don’t know, but...@I have a bad feeling about this...

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Have you heard? Has anyone told you?]@[textBlack:The Rumor of the Ripper Girl!]
[textBlack:Wander into a dark back alley, and an echoing]@[textBlack:bell reaches your ears! Ring, ring, ring.]
[textBlack:That which was lost echoes out, for everyone to hear.]@[textBlack:An echoing bell, ring, ring.]@[textBlack:Ring, ring, an echoing bell.]
[textBlack:Where oh where oh where’d you go?]@[textBlack:I can't find hide nor hair.]@[textBlack:You there, could you please tell me a name?]
[textBlack:Oh, but is that name]@[textBlack:really true?]@[textBlack:If not, I’ll rip and tear!]@[textBlack:I’ll tear your memories to shreds,]@[textBlack:so you’d better be]
[textBlack:No, no, no, tha]@[textBlack:Not giving a]@[textBlack:In that ca]@[textBlack:Welc]@[textBlack:Fro]
